overview: The porn biz is in a panic. A killer is on the loose putting porn stars in diabolical sexual situations. The sole survivor, while being interviewed, gives a clue which delves you deeper into the story of the madman behind the puppet. It's up to Detective Roush and his partner Detective Humpsey to catch him.
tagline: Oh yes, there will be sex...
title: Saw: A Hardcore Parody
